name: Flying Bird - game based on Flappy Bird but more harder
name_original: Flying Bird - game based on Flappy Bird but more harder
description:
Flying Bird - game based on Flappy Bird but more harder

Game available on variety platform: HTML5, Windows, macOS, Android. 

You can also play on iOS directly in Safari, click on "Run game" button on top of the page. 

If you enjoy it, please buy me a beer (donate), I would be highly appreciated.
